original_text: Below these chambers was an entrance on the east side, as one enters them from the outer court.
korean_text: 이 방들 아래에 동쪽에서 들어가는 통행구가 있으니 곧 바깥뜰에서 들어가는 통행구더라

sentences.original_text: Below these chambers was an entrance on the east side,
sentences.korean_translation: 이 방들 아래 동쪽에 입구가 있었고,

sentences.original_text: as one enters them from the outer court.
